messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
If I beat you, will you share some
food with me?
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
We were starved for food, and now
we’re starved for a win...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Sigh... I feel even hungrier...
Maybe I’ll chow down some Berries...But that’s kind of gross.
What am I, a Pokémon?
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I, uh, chowed down my packed lunch
before we started climbing.If I beat you this time, share some
food with me!
